const userForest = new Forest({
  name: 'user-forest',
  value: { name: '', age: 0, email: '' },
  actions: {
    setName: (value, name: string) => this.set('name', name),
    setAge: (value, age: number) => this.set('age', age),
    setEmail: (value, email: string) => this.set('email', email)
  },
  tests: [
    (value) => value.age < 0 ? 'Age cannot be negative' : null,
    (value) => !value.email.includes('@') ? 'Invalid email' : null
  ]
});
